name: power-bracer
effect: Held: Decreases the holder’s Speed by 50%. Whenever the holder gains Attack effort from battle, increases that effort by 4; this applies before the PokéRUS doubling effect.
short_effect: Held: Holder gains 4 Attack effort values, but has halved Speed in battle.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Attack gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.
flavor_text.platinum: A Pokémon hold item that promotes Attack gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A Pokémon held item that promotes Attack gain on leveling, but reduces the Speed stat.
